author: Mary Carolan
title: Supreme Court judges concerned about physical sittings due to Covid-19 risk
description: Chief Justice tells remote sitting spread of virus among members could have knock-on effects
content:
The nine judges of the Supreme Court are concerned about holding physical hearings during the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic, Chief Justice Frank Clarke has said.
Speaking as the court conducted its first ever hearing using remote video technology on Monday, the … [+3706 chars]
